body:
Looks like they have just introduced this feature.
I saw a red delete icon next to the tvOS version in the left side when I hovered my mouse pointer over it.

When I clicked the button it asked me to confirm it

And on confirming the tvOS version went away.

I have to delete and create tvOS version again just for taking the screenshots, so I guess it's working perfectly now.

PS: The feature was not there a couple of weeks ago when I last checked.
title: How to remove tvOS app from iTunes Connect?
